S

saveMap(WargameMap, String) - Method in class Model.EngineCommand
This function is used to write continent, country and neighbours/borders to a map file It is executed when user enters savemap command It first displays continents then countries and then borders

STARTPLAY - Enum constant in enum class Model.GamePhase
This phase starts when player enters the command 'loadmap' In this phase players are assigned to the game using 'gameplayer' command The map is selected with loadmap command 'assigncountries' command leads to end of this phase and start next phase
